column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////They ferment their dough for a bit so it takes on a sourdough flavor
column2: which I love! I personally always go for the classic
column3: which has a layer of sausage along with the hearty helping of cheese and sauce. The Lou is great too with cheddar
column5: sauce and more mozz. But really? Just order the classic. You'll be satisfied.
